name: Color Run (PolAlsinaDomenechITB)
description:
Color Run

This Project has been done by Pol Alsina, Alejandro Mendez and Aitor Martinez.

This is a school project for ITB.

Infinite run that is done to make aware to the society of the people that are colour bind.

You have to defeat the boss that steals your colour, once defeated you can continue to infinity.
